attributes.action: state what circumstances will be in place to say when the army has completed it's task in afganistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: how will we know when the adventure into afganistan will be complete? Will it be when the americans say we can go as the so called war on terror seems to have ended.

rejection.details:
The PM has already stated that Afghan forces are not yet ready to take on the Taliban by themselves – when they are, UK troops can come home. 

For more information visit http://www.fco.gov.uk/en/global-issues/conflict-prevention/afghanistan/uk-effort-in-afghanistan/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
